StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCountries_new]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
--create a table variable to hold the countries DECLARE @countries table (ID int ,code varchar(2) ,[Name] varchar(80)) --Insert country code us .rst so it defaults to this. SELECT ID, Code, Name
FROM [USMC].[vwCountries2] order by weighted, name
